Summary: The drop-down list items are not shown in the 'Select country' drop-down list after clicking the 'Select country' container

Steps to reproduce.2: Click the 'Museums' button on the navigation menu
Steps to reproduce.3: Click on the 'Select country' container of the 'Search' section
Steps to reproduce.4: Pay attention to the drop-down list

Actual result: The 'Select country' container is highlighted in green and the drop-down list items  are not shown in the drop-down list of the 'Search' section on the 'Museums' page after clicking the 'Select country' container
Expected result: The selection of the countries is shown in the 'Select country' drop-down list of the 'Search' section on the 'Museums' page after clicking the 'Select country' container
